START,*.text: You find yourself awakening from a brief reverie, but feeling as if it were from a deep slumber. You are in your lounge.  On the wall are paintings rendered by friends. You are filled with a great sense of apathy, and you refuse to *leave* this room.

START,leave.text: You leave your room and begin the rest of your life.

WIN,*.text: Having overcome apathy and left your room, you have already won at life.
